{% trans -%} This command only perform imposition of the front of your fanzine. It is your job to print the poster on the back. {%- endtrans %}

  1. {% trans -%} Print the resulting PDF one-sided. {%- endtrans %}
  2. {% trans -%} Cut the paper between the medium pages, as shown above. {%- endtrans %}
  3. {% trans -%} Fold the paper by (1) placing pages 1 and 2 back to back, and (2) placing each even page against the next one. {%- endtrans %}
